results.title: Ecology and dreams
results.creator_credit: Roberto Salvatore and ACMI Content Development
results.brief_description: A dream for Lizzie and Shayne to make a difference in our world has become a reality in their little part of it. Together they have established the award-winning Cape Otway Centre for Conservation Ecology.
results.description: A dream for Lizzie and Shayne to make a difference in our world has become a reality in their little part of it. Together they have established the award-winning Cape Otway Centre for Conservation Ecology.

results.title: Throwing sports
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “1976 Olympic Films”.
Shows throwing sports from the 1976 Olympic games in Montreal, Canada. Includes shot put, discus, hammer throw

results.title: Various sports
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “1976 Olympic Films”
Various sports from the 1976 Olympic Games Montreal, Canada. Includes, high jump, long jump, triple jump, pole vault. Silent film.

group_siblings.title: [Various women's athletic events from the 1976 Olympic Games]

results.title: Eat,Sleep and Cycle
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “1976 Olympic Films”.
Riders from all over the world competed in this bicycle Marathon from Brisbane to Sydney. All the grit, determination and endurance of the riders is captured in this film. Rated: G
results.description:

results.title: Running
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “1976 Olympic Films”.
Compiled as a visual aid to coaching and physical education, this film collects silent, slow-motion footage of the men’s track events at the 1976 Montreal Olympics.

Episode of Series “1976 Olympic Films”.
